serviceAds.title: Google Ads Management Service
serviceAds.desc: Optimize your budget – Increase revenue – Dominate search results with an effective Google Ads strategy.
serviceAds.overviewDesc: Our Google Ads service helps businesses quickly reach potential customers through Google Search. With an experienced team, we ensure your ads achieve maximum effectiveness, attract the right audience, and deliver the highest ROI.
overviewList: Reach customers who are actively searching for your products or services
Track and optimize campaigns in real time
serviceAds.benefitsTitle: Benefits of Using Google Ads Service

benefits.title: Reach the Right Target Audience
benefits.desc: Google Ads ensures your business appears in front of users actively searching for your products or services.

benefits.title: Optimize Advertising Costs
benefits.desc: Spend smarter with flexible budget control and detailed performance tracking.

benefits.title: Boost Revenue Quickly
benefits.desc: Increase conversions by targeting user intent, driving more potential customers and sales.

steps.title: Market & Competitor Analysis
steps.desc: We start by researching your market, analyzing competitors, and understanding customer behavior.

steps.title: Ad Strategy Development
steps.desc: Create a detailed plan with keywords, budget, ad creatives, and communication messages.

steps.title: Campaign Launch & Optimization
steps.desc: Run ads, monitor performance, and make real-time adjustments to maximize results.

steps.title: Reporting & Continuous Improvement
steps.desc: Summarize performance, provide regular reports, and recommend optimization strategies.

list.title: Marketing Workshop 2025
list.desc: A sharing session on modern marketing skills for small and medium businesses.
list.content: In the Marketing Workshop 2025, SMADS introduced the latest marketing trends — from content strategy and social media management to the application of AI in advertising. The event attracted many young entrepreneurs and received positive feedback.

list.title: Team Building Da Nang 2025
list.desc: A bonding journey for SMADS with exciting and creative outdoor activities.
list.content: The Team Building Da Nang trip was a wonderful opportunity for SMADS members to connect and create memorable moments together. The program featured beach games at My Khe that fostered teamwork and creativity.

list.title: Summer Brand Campaign
list.desc: SMADS partners with clients to launch creative brand campaigns across platforms.
list.content: The Summer Brand Campaign helped SMADS’ partners reach millions of customers across social media platforms, increasing brand awareness effectively and creatively.

career.introDesc: We’re always looking for creative, passionate, and driven individuals in the field of media & marketing.
